comments.body:
Windows is failing because you need to define entry points, see these links:
 - https://github.com/chanzuckerberg/miniwdl/blob/master/setup.cfg#L24
 - https://docs.conda.io/projects/conda-build/en/latest/resources/define-metadata.html?highlight=selectors#python-entry-points

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +13,17 @@  noarch: python
  number: 0
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . --no-deps --ignore-installed -vv "
  entry_points:
    - miniwdl = WDL.CLI:main

comments.body: Can you add a test command for the entry_point? See [here](https://docs.conda.io/projects/conda-build/en/latest/resources/define-metadata.html?highlight=selectors#python-entry-points)
